participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

peerinfluence_q1.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people go along with their friends just to keep their friends happy; 2 = 2, Other people refuse to go along with what their friends want to do, even though they know it will make their friends unhappy

Levels.1: 1, Some people go along with their friends just to keep their friends happy
Levels.2: 2, Other people refuse to go along with what their friends want to do, even though they know it will make their friends unhappy

peerinfluence_q2.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people think it's more important to be an individual than to fit in with the crowd; 2 = 2, Other people think it is more important to fit in with the crowd than to stand out as an individual

Levels.1: 1, Some people think it's more important to be an individual than to fit in with the crowd
Levels.2: 2, Other people think it is more important to fit in with the crowd than to stand out as an individual

peerinfluence_q3.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, For some people, it's pretty easy for their friends to get them to change their mind; 2 = 2, For other people, it's pretty hard for their friends to get them to change their mind

Levels.1: 1, For some people, it's pretty easy for their friends to get them to change their mind
Levels.2: 2, For other people, it's pretty hard for their friends to get them to change their mind

peerinfluence_q4.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people would do something that they knew was wrong just to stay on their friends' good side; 2 = 2, Other people would not do something they knew was wrong just to stay on their friends' good side

Levels.1: 1, Some people would do something that they knew was wrong just to stay on their friends' good side
Levels.2: 2, Other people would not do something they knew was wrong just to stay on their friends' good side

peerinfluence_q5.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people hide their true opinion from their friends if they think their friends will make fun of them because of it; 2 = 2, Other people will say their true opinion in front of their friends, even if they know their friends will make fun of them because of it

Levels.1: 1, Some people hide their true opinion from their friends if they think their friends will make fun of them because of it
Levels.2: 2, Other people will say their true opinion in front of their friends, even if they know their friends will make fun of them because of it

peerinfluence_q6.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people will not break the law just because their friends say that they would; 2 = 2, Other people would break the law if their friends said that they would break it

Levels.1: 1, Some people will not break the law just because their friends say that they would
Levels.2: 2, Other people would break the law if their friends said that they would break it

peerinfluence_q7.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people change the way they act so much when they are with their friends that they wonder who they "really are"; 2 = 2, Other people act the same way when they are alone as they do when they are with their friends

Levels.1: 1, Some people change the way they act so much when they are with their friends that they wonder who they "really are"
Levels.2: 2, Other people act the same way when they are alone as they do when they are with their friends

peerinfluence_q8.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people take more risks when they are with their friends than they do when they are alone; 2 = 2, Other people act just as risky when they are alone as when they are with their friends

Levels.1: 1, Some people take more risks when they are with their friends than they do when they are alone
Levels.2: 2, Other people act just as risky when they are alone as when they are with their friends

peerinfluence_q9.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people say things they don't really believe because they think it will make their friends respect them more; 2 = 2, Other people would not say things they didn't really believe just to get their friends to respect them more

Levels.1: 1, Some people say things they don't really believe because they think it will make their friends respect them more
Levels.2: 2, Other people would not say things they didn't really believe just to get their friends to respect them more

peerinfluence_q10.Description: Which sort of person are you most like? | 1 = 1, Some people think it's better to be an individual even if people will be angry at you for going against the crowd; 2 = 2, Other people think it's better to go along with the crowd than to make people angry at you

Levels.1: 1, Some people think it's better to be an individual even if people will be angry at you for going against the crowd
Levels.2: 2, Other people think it's better to go along with the crowd than to make people angry at you

peerinfluence_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1 = RA-Administered; 2 = Youth Self-Administered; 3 = Combination

peerinfluence_ss_mean.Description: Peer Influence Summary Score: Mean of all items; Validation: minimum of 7 items answered
